title: Midnight Indigo Ikat Fit & Flare Dress
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a women's fit-and-flare dress with short sleeves, V-neckline, knee-length hem, featuring a commercial ikat-inspired print in midnight indigo, soft cream, and muted gold. Isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, clean finishing, no model or mannequin.
prints_patterns: Ikat-inspired geometric pattern with blurred edges
techpack: Woven cotton-viscose blend with digitally printed ikat pattern; bodice lined; invisible side zipper; short sleeves with clean hem; V-neckline reinforced with facing; skirt panels cut to enhance flare; knee-length; topstitching for durability.
provenance: Inspired by traditional ikat weaving patterns, adapted for digital print to ensure commercial scalability and consistent quality.
design_text:
Midnight Indigo Ikat Fit & Flare Dress (IKAT-2024-001)
Colors: Midnight Indigo, Soft Cream, Muted Gold
Fabrics: Cotton, Viscose Blend
Prints/Patterns: Ikat-inspired geometric pattern with blurred edges
Garment Type: Dress
Silhouette: Fit and Flare
Sleeves: Short Sleeves
Neckline: V-Neck
Length: Knee Length
Style / Fit: T, a, i, l, o, r, e, d,  , b, o, d, i, c, e,  , w, i, t, h,  , f, l, a, r, e, d,  , s, k, i, r, t
Trims & details: Invisible side zipper, Topstitching along neckline, Soft lining in bodice
Techpack: available
